item.title: Gardens of the birds' unfinished songs
Quadro
item.description: for fl, pno, vn, vc timbral stations. imaginative trajectories. a route of sound traces . Short excerpt from the performance ( listen here from 91:56 min ) by the ensemble Reflexion K during the Provinzlärm Festival (February 2023, Eckernförde), recorded and transmitted by the Deutschlandsfunk radio.

item.title: Interference
item.description: For Ensemble Nostri Temporis (fl, ob, cl, horn, vn, vc)

item.title: S
item.description: for 3 female voices „S“ is short for Sanbiki no saru. Sanbiki no saru (literally “three monkeys”), sometimes called the three mystic apes, are a pictorial maxim. Together they embody the proverbial principle “See no evil, hear no evil, speak no evil”. The three monkeys are Mizaru, covering his eyes, who sees no evil; Kikazaru, covering his ears, who hears no evil; and Iwazaru, covering his mouth, who speaks no evil.

item.title: As soon as (Paradise)
item.description: for horn and bass trombone „…As soon as I want to make this instant moment Perfect Paradise and real dawn by looking back myself inside.“ - Ch.Olson

item.title: De(zember)
item.description: for pianist and assistant (performed by A.Shmurak and A.Kobzar)
